snippet: KEIDAN--Sheldon, on May 18, 2016. Beloved husband of Sandie. Devoted father of Dina and Leslie. Services today, 11:15am at "The Riverside," 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KEIDAN--Sheldon, on May 18, 2016. Beloved husband of Sandie. Devoted father of Dina and Leslie. Services today, 11:15am at "The Riverside," 76th Street and Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
